sec.p: Native to the Atlantic and Gulf coasts of North America from Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada, to Texas, U.S.A. ( Mobberley 1956, Barkworth 2003), and Tamaulipas and Veracruz, Mexico ( Mora-Olivo and Vald√©s-Reyna 2011). Introduced in England, France, and Spain ( Campos et al. 2004), the west coast of the United States (Washington, Oregon, California), New Zealand ( Partridge 1987), and China ( Bixing and Phillips 2006, An et al. 2007, Scholz et al. 2009).
